name: Happy Train Puzzle
description:
Happy Train Puzzle is a fantastic game for the youngest children aged 2 and more.
The graphics of Happy Train Puzzle are inspired by Lego Duplo toys.
If your child loves Lego Duplo, this game is a great choice.

The world created in the game has beautiful graphics, dominated by vibrant and dynamic colours.
Children who like trains and puzzle games will most definitely want to complete all levels of Happy Train Puzzle.

While having fun your child will develop his or her manual skills and learn numbers. Solving jigsaw puzzles teaches your child patience and making correct choices.

A colourful and smiling train will appear after each level is completed properly.

The child's task is to follow the instructions provided by the engine operator.
